placeholderImages.description: Soft, spongy, milk-solid balls soaked in a light and sweet sugar syrup flavored with rose water.
Crispy, chewy, spiral-shaped sweets made from fermented batter, deep-fried and soaked in saffron syrup.
A popular Indian sweet made from gram flour, powdered sugar, and ghee, often flavored with cardamom.
A diamond-shaped sweet made from cashew nuts, sugar, and ghee. A classic festive delicacy.
Soft paneer discs soaked in thickened, sweetened and flavored milk, garnished with nuts.
A rich sweet dish from Mysore made of gram flour, ghee, sugar and water, with a porous texture.
A semi-soft sweet made from khoa, sugar, and traditional flavorings like cardamom and saffron.
Traditional Indian ice cream, dense and creamy, often flavored with pistachio, mango, or cardamom.
A crisp, flaky and melt-in-your-mouth confection that's popular across the country.
An assortment of dense milk-based sweets, often flavored with fruits and nuts.
A vibrant display of assorted Indian sweets.
Close-up of a beautifully garnished Kaju Katli.
The warm, inviting interior of the sweet shop.
A halwai (sweet maker) preparing fresh Jalebi.
A colorful stack of various Barfis.
Freshly made Ladoos on a tray.
